channel.title: Comments on: David Bowie’s involvement with Scarlett Johansson’s Tom Waits album exaggerated

item.title: By: K
item.dc:creator: K
item.description: Damn you and your collection of Scarlett Johansson photos! It's bad enough I'm going to have to suffer through the plot of The Other Boleyn Girl.
item.content:encoded: Damn you and your collection of Scarlett Johansson photos! It’s bad enough I’m going to have to suffer through the plot of The Other Boleyn Girl.
